programme.title: Baba Almajal
programme.desc: Zain; a mechanic struggles to live an honest life with his mother, his fiancée and her siblings. His mother hides the fact that his father is still alive, but the secret she has kept for so long threatens Zain's life and turns it upside down.

programme.title: Wiladah Min Al-Khasira
programme.desc: Presenting the social differences between the upper and lower classes and the problems that arise from them, through highlighting the contradictions experienced by prominent figures, as well as the dangers that young people face in life, in addition to displaying the problems of state employees.

programme.title: Strangest Things The Sphere, the Prophecy Machine and the Canary - Season 2, Episode 5
Curse Of The Ancients
programme.desc: Rome's Rise and Fall: Did our ancestors believe they were cursed? Professor Alice Roberts explores historic cataclysmic events through a scientific lens to dispel the myths. (2 of 5)

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Mazda: Gus and Will take on a Mazda MX-5 that's been given some real boy racer attitude. Can they return it to its former glory? (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: The Mexican
programme.desc: Jerry is forced by his mob boss to bring an antique pistol from Mexico into the US, while having to deal with his girlfriend who wants him to quit working for the mob.

programme.title: Finding Your Feet
programme.desc: On the eve of her retirement , an arrogant and judgmental woman discovers that her husband is having an affair with her best friend, and now has to move with her bohemian sister living in a poor house.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the near future, a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes. Captain John Anderton, an officer from that unit, is himself accused of a future murder that will happen in the next 36 hours. What makes the situation worse, is that Anderton doesn't even know the victim.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: Danny Ocean sets out with his team of professionals to do the most daring heist: rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously and walking out with $150 million dollars.

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: Male Nurse Greg Focker, who wants to commit to his girlfriend, Pam. Greg is shocked to learn that her father is conservative, and that he has to get his approval first. He goes to spend the weekend with her parents, but it seems that Jack doesn't like him, and belittles him throughout his stay. Greg then discovers that Jack is a retired CIA agent.

programme.title: Galactic Agency
programme.desc: The events revolve around the adventures of Dany Oven and his team across the galaxy as they set out on their space truck to repair malfunctions. However, their interventions turn into major problems that must be solved.

programme.title: When I Was Your Age
programme.desc: The child Paul has supernatural powers. As soon as someone says in front of him “when I was your age,” Paul goes back in time to when this person was ten years old, and to return to the present, he goes through many funny adventures.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: The well-known PINKFONG brand Baby Shark is back with an exciting preschool series. It chronicles the hilarious adventures that Baby Shark and the fish William, his best friend, go on while living in Carnivore Cove.

programme.title: Bionic Max
programme.desc: Max, who is considered the first robotic pig in the world, and his friend, the goldfish Jean-Claude, escape from an experimental laboratory, in the hope of gaining freedom and traveling to Woodchuck Woods, where they try to adapt and coexist with natural wildlife.

programme.title: Cleo & Cuquin
programme.desc: The story follows the lives of the eight-year-old girl Cleo and her youngest brother Cuquin who try to help their other siblings with the problems they face, while Cleo tries to figure out what she wishes to be when she grows up using the lessons she learns.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Four young birds -Penny, Rod, Swift, and Brody - become new cadets in Top Wing Academy to earn their wings in order to help their community.

programme.desc: The story follows Santiago, an 8-year-old pirate, and his crew as they embark on rescue operations, discover hidden treasures, and keep the Caribbean high seas protected.

Despite her wealth and apparent happiness, she carries an old secret that makes her cruel to her family and her sister, Maraheb, whom she forcibly marries off to Abdel Latif.

programme.title: Forgotten Files (Ep3)
programme.desc: Drama, People, Thriller 2024 In the 1990s, a series of abductions grip the city, sending shockwaves through the community. programme.title: Malak Rahma

programme.title: El Sandouq
programme.desc: As Reem celebrates her birthday, she receives a box containing strange and incomprehensible contents, and messages asking to save a person before he is killed, leading the three friends, Youssef, Reem and Yassin on an adventure to uncover the mystery of this box.

programme.title: Manzil 12
programme.desc: As Mounira has an extraordinary sense that makes her see things from other worlds, she helps people with that ability, until her young son Sakr dies in a car accident. She decides to get away from everything, and lives a quiet life with her husband, Mohammad, but things take a turn with the arrival of her neighbor, Nadia.

programme.title: Salon Zahra
programme.desc: When wrong chairs arrive to Zahra Salon from a furniture store, things take a turn as inside these chairs are smuggled dollars, which leads Anas, the owner of the furniture store, to enter the neighborhood to get the money.

programme.title: Al Mizan
programme.desc: A suspenseful thriller about what goes on behind the scenes of criminal activities, court and lawyers, with an unexpected twist at the peak.

programme.title: Sanie Al-ahlam
programme.desc: A Sci-Fi thriller about physicist Sami Omran (Maxim Khalil) who finds a way to influence people’s dreams, and even create any dream he wants inside a person’s head.

programme.title: Udaariyaan
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab; however, as the daughter Jasmine dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Mohamed Ali Road 2
programme.desc: Everyone in town thinks that everything has become calm after the death of Shipmaster Abu Shehab (Shehab's father) and Abdel Wahab. Mashary tries to control things with Kamal, but the appearance of Yassin turns things upside down, and he becomes the real ruler.

programme.title: Aaelat Abdel Hamid Hafez
programme.desc: Memories dominate Abdel Hamid’s life, especially as he recalls when he was a student how much he loved Abdel Halim Hafez’s voice which echoes in every corner of his house. As Abdel Hamid deals with the burdens of his family, he decides to make a fateful decision that shocks everyone.

programme.title: Dayman Amer
programme.desc: Amer impersonates an educational doctor to enter the Vision School and work there after he plans this with his friend Lotfi, the secretary of the school manager, Zahra. While he succeeds in gaining the trust and love of the people around him, he hides something from everyone

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae rhaff, rhwyd, rhaw a rhwyf wedi cyrraedd y Siop Pob Dim ac mae Jen am eu defnyddio ar gyfer diwrnod mabolgampau ar y traeth. Jen's arranging a sports day on the beach. Who will win what?

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Magi'n cynnig mynd ag Izzy allan i godi ei chalon, tra bod Siôn yn gwneud gwaith Magi ar y fferm: uh-oh! Siôn offers to do Magi's chores on the farm, but soon finds it's not that easy.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Dewch ar daith rownd y byd. Heddiw, teithiwn i Fecsico. Today we go to Mexico to learn about the history of the Aztecs, Mayans, and the 'Día De Los Muertos' festival; plus we eat tortillas!

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Wrth nofio yn y môr, daw'r Octonots ar draws morfil cefngrwm gyda llais rhyfedd. While diving in the ocean, the Octonauts find a humpback whale with a strange voice. Can they help him?

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Gyda help adar lliwgar, mae'r gân hon yn cynnig cyfle i blant bach ymgyfarwyddo gyda lliwiau. This song gives youngsters an opportunity to familiarise themselves with a variety of colours.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Y tro hwn "Mynd Drot Drot" - cân draddodiadol am fam yn mynd i'r farchnad i siopa. This time "Mynd Drot Drot" - a traditional song about a mother going shopping to the market.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Anlwc yn dilyn Tib heddiw gan greu pob math o helbul i Tib. Tib is being followed by Bad Luck - until Gigglegoon comes along and brightens their day.

programme.title: Kim a Cêt a Twrch
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cêt ar antur hudolus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am Twrch yn y goedwig. Join Kim and Cêt as they search for the character Twrch in the woods.

programme.title: Blero'n Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd yn myd Blero heddiw tybed? What's happening in the world of Blero today?

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Ysgol Y Fenni sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Y Fenni join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Mae Maer Shim Po yn trefnu gorymdaith fawreddog, ond mae ei threfniadau mewn peryg. Maer Shim-Po is planning a parade but threatens to call it off when the Blockers can't play AND march!

programme.title: Halibalw
programme.desc: Ymunwch â chriw Halibalw am raglen llawn hwyl, chwerthin, canu a dawnsio. Join the Halibalw crew for lots of fun, laughter, singing and dancing.

programme.title: Oli Wyn
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Lewis a Doug am ddangos lori graen wrth ei waith. Today, Lewis and Doug show us a crane lorry at work.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Tomi Broch wedi cael llond bol ar y tywydd oer ac mae'n mynd i gynhesu o flaen y tân yn nhy Benja. When Tomi Broch decides he's had enough of the cold he takes shelter by the fire.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Amser stori yw un o hoff amserau Bobo Gwyn o'r dydd a heddiw mae'n clywed stori sy'n tanio'i ddychymyg! Bobo Gwyn loves storytime and today he hears a story which fires his imagination.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae 'na ymwelydd newydd i'r harbwr, dolffin cyfeillgar, ac mae pawb wrth eu bodd yn chwarae gydag e. An unexpected guest arrives at the harbour, a friendly dolphin.

programme.title: Nos Da Cyw
programme.desc: Cyfres o straeon bach cyn cysgu. Heddiw, Tara Bethan sy'n darllen Trysor. A series of bedtime stories. Today, Tara Bethan reads Trysor.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae'r gwencwn yn dwyn cwch Gwich ond cyn bo hir ma' nhw mewn trafferth ar afon wyllt. The weasels steal Gwich's rowing boat but soon find themselves in trouble on a fast flowing river.

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith yn ôl
programme.desc: Rhaglen lle gallwn ddysgu mwy am gyfnodau arall ar hyd y canrifoedd. A programme in which we learn more about different periods in history.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Dewch i gwrdd â'r criw printio - Melyn, Gwyrddlas a Majenta! Meet the Printing Crew - Yellow, Cyan and Magenta!

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae Llew'n poeni'n arw. Mae wedi colli gitâr Bolgi. A all Jen a Jim ei helpu i ddod o hyd i'r gitâr cyn i Bolgi ddod i wybod am y peth? Llew is really worried as he has lost Blogi's guitar!
